mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_message ( client_id, func_code, topic, json_str, state, result_msg, note, creator, create_time, db_status ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{funcCode}, #{topic}, #{jsonStr}, #{state}, #{resultMsg}, #{note}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, 1 )
mapper.update: update data_message set db_status = 0,update_time = sysdate() where db_status = 1 and create_time <= #{date}
